en-US.summary: Automate your dog training. Amaze everyone at parties and show off how your dog follows the trainer's commands.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Dog Trainer to start a training for Bobby.
Alexa, ask Dog Trainer to keep my dog busy.
en-US.name: Dog Trainer
en-US.description:
Dog Trainer for Alexa is a funny and playful way to entertain your dog. Tell the trainer your dog's name, and ask to start a training!

The trainer will ask the dog to come to him, sit and lay down in front of him.

We might need your help the first few times, so go get some treats before starting. Make the dog execute the commands I give him, and reward him with a treat when he does so. Repeat three to five times, and we will be good on our own.

Guaranteed to amaze all your friends and family.

Dog Trainer for Alexa is open source software, the source can be found here: https://github.com/BalloonInc/alexa-dogtrainer

For any suggestions or issues, send us an e-mail on support@ballooninc.be, or create a Github issue.

Let's get started and woof some fun!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: You might need a dog to test it thoroughly ;)
